title: Just a tiny, nitpicky thing I have noticed in the stats screen after games.
body: Whenever you finish a game and load into the stats screen, the chat bar showing who got S's and the chat starts right up the top, where you see everyone join. This means you have to scroll down to see the S's. Just a small thing that I figure is worth mentioning.

replies.body: Yeah I have had that happen as well. Its not much of a bug it only needs a bit of a tweak.
I agree, its just the chat not scrolling to the bottom automatically after game.

Good catch!

Can you make sure to send in a bug report about this one, so the team can track it?  (it the little bug icon bottom right of the client)

Cheers!
Mindstar
